Task001_BrainTumour.description: Segmentation targets are edema, enhancing tumor and necrosis,
input modalities are 0: FLAIR, 1: T1, 2: T1 with contrast agent, 3: T2.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task002_Heart.description: Segmentation target is the left atrium,
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task003_Liver.description: Segmentation targets are liver and tumors,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task004_Hippocampus.description: Segmentation targets posterior and anterior parts of the hippocampus,
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task005_Prostate.description: Segmentation targets are peripheral and central zone,
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task006_Lung.description: input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task007_Pancreas.description: Segmentation targets are pancras and pancreas tumor,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task008_HepaticVessel.description: Segmentation targets are hepatic vesels and liver tumors,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task009_Spleen.description: input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task010_Colon.description: Segmentation target are colon caner primaries,
Also see Medical Segmentation Decathlon, http://medicaldecathlon.com/

Task017_AbdominalOrganSegmentation.description: Multi-Atlas Labeling Beyond the Cranial Vault - Abdomen.
Segmentation targets are thirteen different abdominal organs,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.

Task027_ACDC.description: Segmentation targets are right ventricle, left ventricular cavity and left myocardium,

Task029_LITS.description: Liver and Liver Tumor Segmentation Challenge.
Segmentation targets are liver and liver tumors,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.

Task035_ISBILesionSegmentation.description: Longitudinal multiple sclerosis lesion segmentation Challenge.
input modalities are 0: FLAIR, 1: MPRAGE, 2: proton density, 3: T2.

Task038_CHAOS_Task_3_5_Variant2.description: CHAOS - Combined (CT-MR) Healthy Abdominal Organ Segmentation Challenge (Task 3 & 5).
Segmentation targets are left and right kidney, liver, spleen,
input modalities are 0: T1 in-phase, T1 out-phase, T2 (can be any of those)

Task048_KiTS_clean.description: Kidney and Kidney Tumor Segmentation Challenge.
Segmentation targets kidney and kidney tumors,
input modalities are 0: abdominal CT scan.

Task055_SegTHOR.description: SegTHOR: Segmentation of THoracic Organs at Risk in CT images.
Segmentation targets are aorta, esophagus, heart and trachea,

Task061_CREMI.description: MICCAI Challenge on Circuit Reconstruction from Electron Microscopy Images (Synaptic Cleft segmentation task).
input modalities are 0: serial section transmission electron microscopy of neural tissue.
